question.en-US: What do I see directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我眼前能看到什么？
question.zh-HK: 我眼前能看到乜嘢？

question.en-US: Can you tell me what item is on my left side?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我我左边的是什么项目吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我我左邊嘅係乜嘢項目啊？

question.en-US: What is the item located on my right side?
question.zh-CN: 我右边的物品是什么？
question.zh-HK: 我右邊嘅物品係乜嘢？

question.en-US: Which object is the closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 哪个物体离我最近？
question.zh-HK: 邊個物體離我最近？

question.en-US: Which object is nearest to the center of the frame?
question.zh-CN: 哪个物体最靠近画面中心？
question.zh-HK: 邊個物體最靠近畫面中心？

question.en-US: What object is directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我的正前方是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物體就喺我面前？

question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以識別出最靠近畫面中心嘅物體啊？
